document_data.caption: A map of Westgate showing Silverpiece Way lined in red.
document_data.name: Silverpiece Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Silverpiece Way''' was a major thoroughfare found in the city of [[Westgate]].
document_data.Location: Silverpiece Way began at the [[River Bridge]] in the east section of the city. It ran straight through Westgate, bisecting the north and south sections of the city, to end at the city walls along the western side. Many of Westgate's other streets intersected Silverpiece Way.
